p: For the EDI assay, positive, negative and borderline results were calculated based on the average optical density (OD 450) value for the negative control assayed in triplicate for the specific assay. The positive and negative cut-off values were calculated using the formula: positive cut-off =1.1 x (xNC + 0.18) and negative cut-off = 0.9 x (xNC + 0.18), where xNC is the average OD 450 of triplicate negative control OD values. Samples that had OD 450 values that fell between positive and negative cut-off values were reported as borderline.
